ui.name: Name
ui.downloadAndSetup: Download and set up the AI model and knowledge base to start chatting. Everything runs on your device—your data never leaves your computer.
ui.emptyChatSubtitle: Share what's on your mind or ask a question below.
ui.logOutConfirmCopy: This will end your session and you will have to re-enter your password to enter this chat.
ui.deleteChatHistoryConfirmCopy: Are you sure you would like to delete the chat history? You will not be able to recover the chat history after it is deleted.
ui.loadingTagline: Mental health support that stays private
ui.modelManagerPrompt: Please initialize a model first in the Model Manager tab.

agent.welcome: I'm Confidant. I'm here to support your mental health—gratitude, mindfulness, mood, stress—with private, supportive conversation. I'm not a substitute for therapy or professional care.
agent.privacy: Your conversations stay on your device and are not shared.
agent.disclaimer: I'm not a substitute for therapy or professional mental health care. For serious or ongoing concerns, please reach out to a mental health professional.
agent.askAnything: What would you like to talk about?
agent.sessionFirstMessageIntro: I'm Confidant. I'm here to support your mental health—gratitude, mindfulness, mood, stress, and more. Your conversations stay on your device and are not shared. I'm a supportive companion, not a therapist or substitute for professional care. What would you like to talk about?
agent.sessionFirstMessageReturning2: How can I help you today?
agent.sessionFirstMessageReturning3: Is there something you'd like to follow up on?

errors.title: Error
errors.modelNotReady: Model not initialized. Open Settings and initialize a model.
errors.somethingWentWrong: Something went wrong. Please try again.
errors.modelNotSetUp: The model isn't set up yet. Open Settings and initialize a model.
errors.pythonIssue: Python setup issue. Install Python 3 and llama-cpp-python, then try again.
errors.pythonHint: See PYTHON_SETUP.md for setup, or set VIRTUAL_ENV to your venv path.
errors.timeout: That took too long. Try a shorter question.
errors.passwordTooShort: Password must be at least 4 characters long
errors.duplicateUserName: A user with this name already exists
errors.bundledDefaultsNotFound: Confidant couldn't find the default model or knowledge base. Reinstall the app or open Settings to choose a model.
errors.failedToInitialize: Failed to initialize application. Please try again.

network.zeroBytesPrivacy: ✓ Zero bytes transmitted - Your queries are private

cached.hi: Hi! I'm here to support your mental health—gratitude, mindfulness, mood, stress, and more. What would you like to talk about?
cached.hello: Hello! I'm here for supportive conversation about your mental health. What's on your mind today?
cached.howAreYou: I'm here to support you. What would you like to talk about?
cached.goodMorning: Good morning! I'm here if you'd like to talk about how you're feeling or anything on your mind.
cached.whatCanYouHelpWith: I can help with gratitude, mindfulness, mood, stress, anxiety, and depression—as a supportive companion. I'm not a therapist. Everything stays on your device. What would you like to talk about?
cached.help: I'm here to support you. You can share what's on your mind—mood, stress, gratitude, or how you're feeling. What would you like to talk about?
cached.iAmStruggling: I'm sorry you're struggling. I'm here to listen and support you. I'm not a substitute for therapy or professional care—if things feel too heavy, please reach out to a mental health professional. What would help right now?

setup.privacyInfo: Everything runs on your device—your conversations and data never leave your computer. This one-time setup downloads the AI model and knowledge base you need.
setup.settingsPrivacyInfo: Here you can download AI models and manage your knowledge bases. Everything runs on your device—your conversations and data never leave your computer.
setup.chooseModel: Choose a model already on your computer
setup.foundModels: We found {{count}} model file{{plural}} on your computer.
setup.chooseModelAlreadyOnComputer: Choose a model already on your computer
setup.howItWorksModel: How it works: Enter the path to your GGUF model file and click Initialize Model. The model loads into memory for chat.
setup.enterUrlToDownload: Enter a URL to download a knowledge base file.
setup.formatKnowledgeBase: Format: Knowledge bases are JSON (or .zst) files with documents and embeddings.
setup.clearConfirm: Clear all documents? This cannot be undone.
setup.warningRemoveDocuments: This removes all documents and cannot be undone.
setup.formatNote: Format: Knowledge bases are JSON (or .zst) files with documents and embeddings.
setup.zstdComingSoon: ZSTD support is coming soon; use uncompressed JSON for now.

userKb.enterMedicalHistory: Enter mental health or therapy history...
userKb.noEntriesYet: No entries yet. Add your first entry to get started.
userKb.deleteEntryConfirm: Are you sure you want to delete this entry?
userKb.saveEntryFailed: Failed to save entry. Please try again.
